text: Hagi tamagrane ne'mofavretamine mofa'netamine, ve kazokazo eri'za vahetamine, a kazokazo eri'za vahetamine, tamagranema nemaniza Livae vahetamine, ru vahe'ma tamagranema enemaniza vahetamine, megusa mofavretamine, kento a'nenena Ra Anumzana tamagri Anumzamo'ma mono hunantegahazema hunte'nenia kumate ana ne'zana kreta neneta musena huntegahaze.
